resources.string: Lock your screen easily and enjoy your device\'s display without interruption by preventing unintended touches.
Looking for quicker activation? Just shake your device and go!
Screen Touch Locker also offers a Quick Tile access in your notification bar. Edit yours and put there your Quick Tile access.
While ScreenTouchLocker is activated the device screen is locked and touches will not have any effect.
You might need to grant permissions for ScreenTouchLocker app to work correctly.
